entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
